alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 5:23PM CDT until May 01 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Centreville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Centreville, Talladega National Forest, West Centreville, Randolph, Trio and Bibb County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
